headline.main: ITALIANS CLOSE IN ON YANINA; FOE REPULSED, ATHENS SAYS; BRITISH AID IN AIR REPORTED; FASCISTI NEAR CITY Yanina Reported Under Attack From 2 Sides-- Fall Is Expected Soon ITALIANS IN COAST DRIVE Greeks Say Air Force Aids in Halting of Foe and Routing of 2 Invading Companies

lead_paragraph: ROME, Oct. 31--The High Command in a communique today announced that Italian troops had at various points crossed the Kalamas River, which is about twelve miles from Yanina, and that bad atmospheric conditions and obstacles created by the retreating Greek Army were not retarding troop movements.
